welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Scotch Plains, a charming town known for its historic landmarks and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Wishing you a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a quick registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Teterboro Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: International and domestic flights for airlines such as Air Canada, Southwest, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Domestic flights for major airlines such as Delta and WestJet.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login and have limited speeds.
